metadata.name: Bluebird Mornings with Lucy
metadata.description:
A classic car named Lucy sits in front of the Historic Blue Swallow Motel under pink sunrise skies.

Location  
Blue Swallow Motel, Tucumcari, New Mexico

Date of Capture: Oct 15, 2022  
NFT Open Edition

License
